Workflow.Name: Microsoft Teams Admin | Weekly Clean Up of Microsoft Teams environments
Workflow.Description:
This flow runs weekly and deletes environments that:
Have been created more than 7 days ago and have no business justification, or the business justification has been rejected by the admin. Have been created more than 90 days ago and have no apps or flows in the environment.

LocalizedName.description: Microsoft Teams Admin | Weekly Clean Up of Microsoft Teams environments

Description.description:
This flow runs weekly and deletes environments that:
Have been created more than 7 days ago and have no business justification, or the business justification has been rejected by the admin. Have been created more than 90 days ago and have no apps or flows in the environment.
